edge: Tom Brand, the owner of FireBrand, transforms into a cat named Mr. Fuzzypants in the movie.
Lara is the second wife of Tom Brand and the mother of David.
David is the son of Tom Brand and Madison Camden, the older half-brother of Rebecca and Nicole, and works at FireBrand.
Madison is the former wife of Tom Brand and the mother of David and Nicole.
Ian Cox is the top manager at FireBrand who schemes to take control of the company.
Rebecca is the daughter of Tom and Lara and the paternal half-sister of David.
Felix Perkins is a magician and the owner of an exotic pet store.

Nicole is the daughter of Madison Camden and the maternal half-sister of David Brand.
